SQLFunctionSpec.Name: USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_QUOTATYPE
SQLFunctionSpec.Description: Determines the quota type for a particular child project
SQLFunctionSpec.Author: Cary Mayeda
SQLFunctionSpec.CreateFunctionSQL:
create function dbo.USR_UFN_CHILDPROJECT_QUOTATYPE ( @childProjectID uniqueidentifier -- The Child Project Extension ID of the child project to find the project quota ) returns tinyint with execute as caller as begin declare @quotaTypeCode tinyint = 99 select @quotaTypeCode = QUOTATYPECODE from dbo.USR_CHILDPROJECTEXTENSION where ID = @childProjectID
return @quotaTypeCode end
